fixup.name: ann-fixup
fixup.title: Tell us about your annotation experience

questions.title: Do you think your annotation can be improved?

inputOptions.text: The annotation can be improved but I ran out of time and it was too difficult.
I tried my best, but there were areas that I can’t see or reach or don’t know what to annotate.
It’s perfect!  No improvements can be made!

questions.title: Was the quality of the annotation you started out with okay?

inputOptions.text: The initial annotation was great but needed some small fix ups.
The initial annotation was good but incomplete.
The initial annotation was a complete disaster.
